H0.text: Physical change is the type of change that occurs when the physical properties of a substance are changed.

H1.text: Thermal is the type of change that occurs when the physical properties of a substance are changed.

H2.text: Genetic is the type of change that occurs when the physical properties of a substance are changed.

H3.text: Atmospheric is the type of change that occurs when the physical properties of a substance are changed.

A4.text: Physical changes are changes affecting the form of a chemical substance, but not its chemical composition.

A5.text: Physical changes are used to separate mixtures into their component compounds, but can not usually be used to separate compounds into chemical elements or simpler compounds.
